description:
Casey is a mostly straight guy, but I dunno, I think he is into guys too. I never know if some of the guys feel that they have to be "straight" in order to get work. He doesn't strike me as particularly straight, but hey, I just go with what they say.
You can hear my surprise in my voice when he suddenly decides that talking about guy sex is OK. I had told him I didn't care, and sure enough during the interview, he kinda spills the beans.
He may be into girls too. But he sure seemed to be keeping his gay side to a minimum before the shoot. I think he strips/dances in gay clubs, so at the very least, he is 'open-minded.'
Casey has a hot body on him, with a substantial cock. He is pretty much all shaved up, and we waited for him to grow his pubes out, but I guess they didn't all come in. He has agreed to let it go so he has a more natural look.
He seems fine with doing an oral video, though not ready to suck back. Not sure what that is about, but he is considering doing full on work too.
Casey loves jerking-off and all kinds of sex, so he is definitely made for porn!
title: Casey - Solo
